author: AuroraPerego
body:
#### PR description:

Since CMSSW_15_0_0_pre2, there are no `CaloParticle`s from pileup due to a wrong `ioread` rule that led to misreading the pileup files.
This PR fixes the `ioread` rule, which required temporarily adding back a data member to the `simTrack`s collection (I haven't found a better solution).

In addition, a `processModifier` to consider also `CaloParticle`s from pileup in the associators (leading to the creation of tracksters from pileup) has been added.

#### PR validation:

Tested on 29888.208 and printing the number of caloparticles and simclusters.

@waredjeb @felicepantaleo @rovere
title: Fix missing `CaloParticle`s from pileup
